section.title: Running CloudForms Management Engine
section.para: After uploading the appliance to the export storage domain, import it as a template and create a virtual machine. Use the following procedure as a guide.

procedure.title: To Create and Run CloudForms Management Engine

step.para: Import the appliance image from the export storage domain as a template in a Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization data storage domain. Use your chosen newimagename from to find the image to import as a template. See the section on Importing Templates in the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Administrator Guide for instructions.
Once the import is complete, check the template for a network interface (NIC). If the template does not include one, create a NIC for it.
Create a new virtual machine using the CloudForms Management Engine Appliance template as a basis. See the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Administrator Guide for instructions.
Add a database disk if you are hosting the database on the same machine as the appliance.
Start the newly created CloudForms Management Engine Appliance virtual machine.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: Your Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization environment now contains a running CloudForms Management Engine Appliance.
